td.content: s:patient presents with critical shortness of breath for about 11 days. pt is a 29 yo white female lyricist. o:Height 64 in, Weight 122 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, SaO2 89% RA; 93% on 4L NC, Alert, Mod distress in pt ""tripod-ding"" for breath, PCO2 elevated on ABG, PEF: 25% expected, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Asthma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

s:patient presents w/ c/o 4 weeks h/o critical shortness of breath, critical cough and Respiratory. patient is a white female aged 29 yrs. denies any smoking she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 64 in, Weight 122 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 18, SaO2 89% RA; 93% on 4L NC, Alert, Mod distress in pt ""tripod-ding"" for breath, PCO2 elevated on ABG, PEF: 25% expected, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Asthma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Arterial Blood Gas, Chest X-Ray.

td.content: s:white female lyricist aged 29 ys c/o 7 weeks h/o critical shortness of breath. NKDA. denies any alcohol use she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 64 in, Weight 121 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 16, Arterial Blood Gas 7.4,PaCO2=44 mmHg,PaO2=60 mmHg, Chest X-Ray shows hyperinflated lung, SaO2 89% RA; 93% on 4L NC, Alert, Mod distress in pt ""tripod-ding"" for breath, PCO2 elevated on ABG, PEF: 25% expected, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Asthma p:administered IPRATROPIUM - 0.02 % SOLN neb over 20 min, performed Arterial Blood Gas, Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
